page.title: 13LOCAL INDUSTRY
page.content: One of the most important industries in this area is William Grant and Sons Ltd. We wrote to them asking them to give us some information on the firm and these are some of the details they supplied us with. There are 203 people working there as hourly paid production staff and 109 salaried administrative staff. The factory, in Glenburn, is a bottling warehouse for Grants Standfast Scotch Whisky. The export department at the factory deals with orders from all over the world and some of the other popular products exported from here are Glenfiddich Malt Whisky and Balvenie Gin and Vodka. It is a very important factory because it provides employment for a lot of local people in an area where there are few factories left.
